description: Try our easy to follow Sweet Potato & Chickpeas With Spiced Yoghurt Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Christmas leftovers,Sesame free,Easter leftovers,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Sweet potato,Leftover vegetable,Tomato,Leftovers,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Sweet Potato & Chickpeas With Spiced Yoghurt Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Scrub sweet potatoes, trim ends and halve lengthways. Place into roasting pan, drizzle with half the oil, then season. Bake for 20 minutes.
Meanwhile, combine spices, garlic and remaining oil in a bowl. Add chickpeas, onion and tomato to the bowl and toss to coat. Add to roasting pan with sweet potato and bake for a further 5 minutes.
Add yoghurt to the same bowl (with any remaining spice oil). Stir in cumin and lemon juice.
Place spinach on a platter. Spoon over potato and chickpea mixture. Serve topped with dressing.
